Framework::IServiceTrackerCustomizer

Framework::IServiceTrackerCustomizer Struct Reference
[Utils]

This interface allows a ServiceTracker to customize the service objects that are tracked. More...

Detailed Description

This interface allows a ServiceTracker to customize the service objects that are tracked.

virtual module::IUnknown* Framework::IServiceTrackerCustomizer::AddingService ( IServiceReference *  reference  )  [pure virtual]

Called before a service which matched the search parameters is added to the ServiceTracker.

Parameters:
reference The reference to the service being added to the ServiceTracker
Returns:
The service object to be tracked for the specified referenced service or null if the specified referenced service should not be tracked
